title: MS Office 2013 Transition
headline: Learn about the transition of features across Microsoft Office 2013 from earlier versions in this free online course.
description: ‘MS Office 2013 Transition’ is a free course that explores the features in the productivity suite of applications from Microsoft. You will learn about some of the enhanced features in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access and Outlook. This course will help you come to grips with discovering and using the newest added features and improvements. Enrol today and boost your productivity with your newfound MS Office 2013 skills!
courseDescription:
MS Office is a family of client and server software as well as services developed by Microsoft that helps simplify basic office admin and improve productivity. Each application is designed to address specific tasks, such as word processing, data management, making presentations and organizing emails. Some of the updated features include a new read mode in Word and a presentation mode in PowerPoint. There is also an improved touch and inking feature in all of the Office programs. The Office Web Apps suite was also updated for Office 2013, introducing additional editing features and interface changes. This Microsoft Office 2013 Transition course will help you bridge the gap from the version you already know to the latest release of Office.

To ensure your success, you will need to have familiarity with either Office 2007 or Office 2010, including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access and Outlook. This course builds on the foundational Office knowledge and skills you've already acquired and provides a detailed overview of the new format and features that you will find when transitioning to Office 2013. You will learn about the new online storage and sharing options available and the user interface updates. In addition, discover the new features in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, and Outlook like FlashFill, the new Excel charting features, PowerPoint Eyedropper, Outlook peek views and more. 

This course will help you come to grips with discovering and using the newest added features and improvements. It is specifically focused on the common applications from the MS Office suite that are used by almost every organization. The course is essential to allow smooth transition from the older Microsoft Office versions to the latest Microsoft Office 2013. If you are looking to upgrade your knowledge and skills in Microsoft Office, this course will be a great fit for you.
